title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Motor Wars and Buried Stashes
content:
Parachute into shrinking play areas with up to four teams in Cayo Perico Motor Wars, use a mix of weaponry and vehicles to secure the perimeter by force, or hide and emerge as the last one standing while your foes wipe each other off the map.

Perhaps you’d rather sweep the sands in search of Buried Stashes, also paying out Double Rewards this week. You’ll need to procure a Metal Detector in Los Santos first — look for a washed-up partygoer near bodies of water.
